org.apache.jackrabbit.core.observation
Interface EventDispatcher

All Known Implementing Classes:
ObservationManagerFactory
public interface EventDispatcher

The EventDispatcher interface defines a single method dispatchEvents(org.apache.jackrabbit.core.observation.EventStateCollection), through this method a collection of EventState instances is dispatched to registered EventListeners.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $, $Date: 2004/08/02 16:19:47 $

Method Summary
 void dispatchEvents(EventStateCollection events)
          Dispatches the events to all registered EventListeners.
 

Method Detail

dispatchEvents

public void dispatchEvents(EventStateCollection events)
Dispatches the events to all registered EventListeners.

Parameters:
events - the EventStates to dispatch.
